resources.string: 1.In which decade was the American Institute of Electrical Engineers (AIEE) founded?
2. What is part of a database that holds only one type of information?
4. Which is a type of Electrically-Erasable Programmable Read-Only Memory?
5. Who is largely responsible for breaking the German Enigma codes, created a test that provided a foundation for artificial intelligence?
7. Made from a variety of materials, such as carbon, which inhibits the flow of current?
8. The first step to getting output from a laser is to excite an active medium. What is this process called?
9. Which motor is NOT suitable for use as a DC machine?
10. In which year was MIDI(Musical Instrument Digital Interface) introduced?
